video_prompt: Anime character's sci-fi tech pulsates, screens glow, and wires subtly shift. Her hair and attire gently ripple, hinting at movement. Background text elements subtly reconfigure.
image_prompt: Anime female character, full body, white/orange/blue sci-fi attire, white background. Light brown hair, large brown eyes, subtle earrings, blue and orange barrettes on left ear. White mid-thigh dress with orange/dark grey details, blue jacket with orange/dark grey geometric patterns, puffy/complex sleeves with mechanical elements, white/grey undershirt. Large, complex white/grey mechanical device with orange/dark grey accents and blue lights obscuring her right side. Dark blue thigh-high stockings (left with white/grey square design), futuristic light grey/white/orange boots. Orange inverted "T" graphic, illegible text/symbols with circular outline and paragraph blocks, thin dark lines from device. Sleek, futuristic, high-tech aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: The anime character's sci-fi tech pulses with energy. Holographic screens dynamically flicker, displaying shifting data. Wires subtly undulate and flex. Her hair and attire softly ripple. Background text elements continuously reconfigure and reform.
